def find_max_difference_pair(arr):
    max_diff = float('-inf')
    pair = None
    left = 1
    right = len(arr) - 1
    while left < right:
        diff = arr[right] - arr[left]
        if diff > max_diff:
            max_diff = diff
            pair = (arr[left], arr[right])
        left += 1
        while left < right and arr[left] == arr[left - 1]:
            left += 1
        right -= 1
        while left < right and arr[right] == arr[right + 1]:
            right -= 1
    return pair
